title: Admin Settings
description: When Global Posting is ON, end users can't post to everyone, only to their Team(s) or permitted Channels.

branding.title: Branding
branding.help-text: Replace 'Auzmor Office' name from UI with your own name.
branding.fileSize-error: The file size exceeds the limit.
branding.read-alert-des: We suggest using high-contrast colors for better readability.
branding.toast-fail: Changes you made may not have been saved.
branding.toast-success: Changes you made have been saved.
branding.sign-in-text: Enter your details to get signed in to your account.

integration.title: Integration
integration.deelDescription: Deel is a global HR platform that helps companies manage their international workforce.
integration.deelConfigDescription: Data from your Deel HR account will be synced to Auzmor office.
integration.deelConfigNote: Note: Data syncs automatically after every 24 hours.
integration.dataSyncDescription: Data from your Deel HR account will be synced to Auzmor office.
integration.dataSyncNote: Note: Data syncs automatically after every 24 hours.

sso.title: Single Sign-On
sso.active-dir-des: LDAP (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol) is an internet protocol used to look up user data from a server.
sso.okta-des: The Okta Identity Cloud is an independent and neutral platform that securely connects the right people to the right technologies at the right time.
sso.saml-des: Seamlessly enable secure access to Auzmor Learn through your own SAML-enabled identity provider.
sso.azure-des: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is Microsoft's cloud-based identity and access management service.
sso.gsuite-des: Use Google Cloud Identity to manage your users, apps, and devices from a central location—the Google Admin console.
